name: Grimer
flavorText:
Appears in filthy
areas. Thrives by
sucking up polluted sludge
that is pumped
out of factories.

previous.name: Dewgong
previous.flavorText:
Stores thermal
energy in its
body. Swims at a steady 8 knots
even in intensely
cold waters.

next.name: Muk
next.flavorText:
Thickly covered
with a filthy,
vile sludge. It is so toxic, even
its footprints
contain poison.
